title: Phase IV Study of Determining the Efficacy of Ampicillin/Sulbactam Combination as Antibiotic Prophylaxis During Breast Cancer Surgery in Patients With a Body Mass Index (BMI) Over 25.

operands.value: Women at any age with early stage breast cancer (stage I-II) and American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) score of I-II
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS; stage 0 cancer)
History of receiving any antibiotics within prior 3 months
History of reaction to study antibiotics
Denial of signing the consent form

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Must be FEMALE'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Women at any age with early stage breast cancer (stage I-II) and American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) score of I-II'), Not(Or(Symbol('Advanced or distant metastatic stage'), Symbol('Denial of signing the consent form'), Symbol('Ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS; stage 0 cancer)'), Symbol('Having a remote infection'), Symbol('History of immunodeficiency'), Symbol('History of reaction to study antibiotics'), Symbol('History of receiving any antibiotics within prior 3 months'), Symbol('Receiving any neoadjuvant therapy'))))
